GitHub Issue #21: Add Agent Builder following IndyDevDan's standards

## Description
Create an agent builder system using a model-based approach that follows IndyDevDan's agent architecture patterns.

## Requirements
- Create Agent model with proper Eloquent relationships
- Define agent configuration schema (name, instructions, tools, model settings)
- Build agent management UI (create, edit, list, delete agents)
- Integrate with existing chat system to use custom agents
- Follow Laravel conventions with factories, migrations, and tests

## IndyDevDan Standards
- Clean separation of agent definition from execution
- Configuration-driven agent behavior
- Support for tool/capability definitions
- Proper state management

Close with: fixes #21

completed.spec: GitHub Issue #1: Add markdown rendering for chat messages
completed.output:
Implemented markdown rendering for AI assistant chat messages.

## Changes:
- ChatMessage.vue: Added markdown rendering for assistant messages using `marked` library
- ChatMessage.vue: Added test data attributes (data-testid) for browser testing
- User messages remain plain text as required
- Dark mode supported via existing custom CSS styling

## Tests:
- Added tests/Browser/MarkdownRenderingTest.php with 6 tests:
  - Renders markdown in assistant messages (h1, bold, italic, lists, code blocks)
  - Keeps user messages as plain text
  - Renders code blocks with proper formatting
  - Renders inline code properly
  - Renders ordered and unordered lists
  - Renders links correctly
- All 362 tests pass

## Notes:
- `marked` library was already installed
- @tailwindcss/typography not installed (package.json in blocked_paths) - custom prose styles used instead
- highlight.js not installed (package.json in blocked_paths) - syntax highlighting deferred
